Title: UnitOfWorkAndRepositoryOnNorthwind
Description: Study and test Entity Framework, Repository, UnitOfWork and WPF MVVM based on Northwind Database
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Just for test now, using Northwind database to study Entity Framework, Repository, UnitOfWork and WPF MVVM.

Here we have a draft version of the whole Framework, still one key problem, how to manage UnitOfWork among different BL class or BL Module
